@description.name: @description
@description.body: The PasswordField is a single-line password input field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the {@link #changeValue} event should be fired on every key input. If set to true, the changeValue event is equal to the {@link #input} event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Maximal number of characters that can be entered in the input field.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: String value which will be shown as a hint if the field is all of: unset, unfocused and enabled. Set to null to not show a placeholder text.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether the field is read only

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is valid. If a widget is invalid, an invalid state will be set.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Flag signaling if a widget is required.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which is shown in an invalid tooltip.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Message which is shown in an invalid tooltip if the {@link #required} is set to true.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Model property for storing additional information for the including object. It can act as value property on form items for example. Be careful using that property as this is used for the {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection} it has some restrictions:

  • Don't use equal models in one widget using the {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection}.
  • Avoid setting only some model properties if the widgets are added to a {@link qx.ui.form.MModelSelection} widget. Both restrictions result of the fact, that the set models are deputies for their widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the element's value.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {String|null} The new value of the element.
@param.description: The new value of the element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the element's value to its initial value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The element's user set value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Converts the incoming value.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for focus event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for blur event.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether this widget has focus or not.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the {@link #changeValue} event occurs.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Data} The event, containing the changed content.
@param.description: The event, containing the changed content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler. Called when the {@link #input} event occurs.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: evt {qx.event.type.Data} The event, containing the changed content.
@param.description: The event, containing the changed content.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the caret position of this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the caret position on this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fires the {@link #changeValue} event.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: value {var} The current value to fire.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property liveUpdate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property liveUpdate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property liveUpdate. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property liveUpdate. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #liveUpdate}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Points the focus of the form to this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Removes the focus from this widget.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired when the value was modified

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The event is fired on every keystroke modifying the value of the field. The method {@link qx.event.type.Data#getData} returns the current value of the text field.
